entries.thug_player_line_1_2: Why are you being so hostile?
entries.thug_npc_response_2_1: Answering questions like that can get you killed.
entries.thug_npc_response_2_2: Do I care?  No.  Go away.
entries.thug_npc_response_3_3: I'll forget this whole thing ever happened
entries.thug_npc_job_offer_1: I got work.  If you don't mind getting your hands dirty you can have it.  Want it?
entries.thug_npc_job_offer_2: There's plenty to do if you're willing to bend a few laws...
entries.thug_npc_job_offer_3: I don't know if I trust you, but I got something I need done if you're willing.
entries.player_job_refuse: I think I'll pass on this one.
entries.thug_npc_go_home: I knew you were a waste of my time.
